case.title: After Work Drinks - 35 (Midtown)
case.text: It has been a long day at work. Anyone want to meet after work for an after work drink in midtown, it is nice out...I'm intelligent, sane, cute, educated and driven. Outgoing and pleasant, and looking to connect with a hot/good looking intelligent successful guy for drinks and witty banter please be around my age or younger. Please describe yourself and what you do, and more than a 1 liner. I like HBS and Wharton types and mostly Wall St. Types. Thanks. Out of town guys are ok as well.
